sentences.sContent: The king hight them to attack the castle.
sentences.sCn: 国王命令他们向城堡发起进攻。

sentences.sContent: We reopened an attack against our enemy last week.
sentences.sCn: 上周我们向敌人重新发动了一次进攻。

sentences.sContent: ...wrote conservative writer jennifer rubin earlier this year terring to the attack on americans in benghazi...
...The end result is a destructive attack on the quality of your education...

trans.tranOther: to use weapons, such as guns and bombs against an enemy in a war, etc.
an act of trying to kill or injure the enemy in war, using weapons such as guns and bombs
